allQuotes.text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
allQuotes.author: George Addair

allQuotes.text: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.
allQuotes.author: Teddy Roosevelt

allQuotes.text: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
allQuotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

allQuotes.text: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
allQuotes.author: W. Clement Stone

allQuotes.text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
allQuotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

allQuotes.text: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me.
allQuotes.author: Erma Bombeck

allQuotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
allQuotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

allQuotes.text: What’s money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
allQuotes.author: Bob Dylan
